ai.question: What happens when part of a message using TCP is not delivered to the destination host?

choice.text: The sender resends the entire message.
The sender sends a request to find out what happened.
Nothing. TCP does not check for errors and missing data.
The part of the message that is missing is retransmitted.

ai.question: Select three protocols that operate at the Application Layer of the OSI model. (Choose three.)
